item.title: Hosting static websites on s3, CloudFront and Route 53 (CD pipeline included)
item.description: Hosting static websites on s3 + CloudFront + Route 53 (CD pipeline included) AWS S3 provides a cost-efficient solution for hosting static websites - built through static website engines or any frontend framework including React -, and they are almost hassle free as you don’t have to manage any servers or worry about load balancing. Additionaly with CloudFront, you get very good website speed and you’re able to easily add free HTTPS support to your website with AWS ACM, add basic authentication with AWS Lambda (which we might explore later)
